name: simple-utils
description: simple javascript utils writing with es6
author: liximomo

scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=rollup NODE_ENV=development rollup -c --output.format umd -o dist/simple-utils.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=rollup NODE_ENV=production rollup -c --output.format umd -o dist/simple-utils.min.js
